column1: Table 38. General situation of national pension

column2: 1.自81年度起，垃圾處理量含自行或委託清運至垃圾場(廠)之一般事業廢棄物，故平均每日垃圾清運量與處理量總計不相等。

column1: (2) The grand total means the sum of the persons receiving pensions at the end of the recent year and the total of the persons receiving maternity
Source: Bureau of Labor Insurance, Ministry of Labor
